name: Super Wah
description:
Super Wah is a short Super Mario Bros. parody where you play as Waluigi and try to complete an unfairly difficult level. It was made during a 24-hour game jam for the 2018 Jalloo festival in Miramichi.

PC controls

  • WASD - Move
  • J - Jump
  • Enter - Start

Controller controls

  • D-Pad/Analog stick - Move
  • A - Jump
  • Start - Start
